nodes.text: Cookies were a type of food that existed in the galaxy. Sweet-sand cookies were a type of cookies popular with children. Grogu used the Force to steal a pack of blue cookies on Nevarro.
The non-canonical 2016 LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens video game introduced Wookiee Cookies, a type of cookies favored by the Wookiee warrior Chewbacca.
